cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.7.0)

# add sources to the project
set (sources
     ${sources}
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/counter.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/def.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/shared.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slot1.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slot2.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slot3.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slot4.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/slot5.hpp
     PARENT_SCOPE)
